synopsis.text:
Annoyed by the neglected guitar with rusty strings, high school student Ritsuka Uenoyama finds himself reluctantly teaching its owner, Mafuyu Satou, how to play. Little does he know, this chance encounter on the gymnasium staircase will change his life forever. As he begrudgingly invites Satou to his band's rehearsal, Uenoyama is struck by the haunting beauty of Satou's voice. This unexpected revelation reignites Uenoyama's passion for music and sets him on a mission to make Satou the band's lead singer.

As the two grow closer, Uenoyama learns of the mysterious circumstances surrounding Satou's guitar, and the pain that lies beneath his quiet demeanor. With the support of bandmates Haruki Nakayama and Akihiko Kaji, Uenoyama helps Satou confront his past and find solace in music. Together, they embark on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, and love, as they create beautiful music that resonates with their souls. Will Satou find the strength to overcome his past and embrace his newfound passion for music? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
